job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in technology, Master's preferred

jd: Dear Partners,I hope this email finds you well.My name is Ravikanth Naraharisetty, and I am reaching out to share an exciting job opportunity at RohaTech. We are currently looking for Senior Java Developer – 3 Positions – priorityLocation : Pasadena CA – Onsite Pay : $57/60/hr on c2c RATE CARD we Have Description:Requires programming skills, involved in the development of software applications. Knowledge of programming languages to develop necessary specifications for the software by following the technical designs. In specific cases, knowledgeable on Agile/iterative development methodologies will be required (and called out).Skill/Experience/Education:Mandatory:10+ years relevant client experience in similar technology (does not include training period), Including at least 5 years of on-site client experience in similar technology and domain - Min Education - Bachelors degree in technology, Masters preferredDesired Skills:Java, Spring, AWS Technologies. (WhatsApp Me +91 7036012291) OR (602-946-1105 (you can text me))Alos Please ensure to attach the following documents with the screening DetailsVisa copyDL copyPassport NumberLinkedin UrlDOB: 93/94 MAX with sure Shout Interviews need Strong Profiles wo has Real Time Experience VISA: H1, H4, Stem OPT, H1 transfer will works (NO GC EAD, USC)In order to screen your consultant, we must have all the details listed below. Kindly ensure all information is Accurate Screening DetailsFull Name:- Phone Number:- Email:- Linkedin:-Current Location:- Open to Relocation:-Passport Number:- Visa Status:-DOB(Including Year):- Total Experience:-US Experience:-Relevant Experience:-Complete Education:-Availability to Join:-H1 Employer DetailsName:Email:Contact : Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to receiving the necessary details.Best regards, Ravikanth RohaTech.Reach ME at Below +91-7036012291 WhatsApp Me Ravi@rohatech.comhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/raviroha/
